TextBody:
Hello Andreas,

I hope this message finds you well. Our R&D team got back to us reporting that they fixed this issue on the following test build:

https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp21032025/EppClient_v6.2.4.0111.zip

This can be tested by installing any older EPP version(such as the 6.2.3.1xxx from 5.9.4.0) and upgrade it to the test build that we have provided. 

Also, please make sure the department is changed to the custom one before applying the upgrade.

The upgrade can be made by using the GUI installer or using command line.

Please test this on 2-3 devices and let me know if it works accordingly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 2/27/2025 5:03 PM
To: andreas.ster@netwrix.com
Subject: Upgrading the agent from the console will revert department to defdep [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0MN2PT:ref ]

Hello Andreas,

Thank you for opening this case.

I would like to inform you that we have opened a case with our R&D team to investigate this scenario.

We will get back to you as soon as we have an update from them.


Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000MN2PT:ref

Hi Marian,

Thank you.
I can confirm that this is now working as I initially expected.
Feel free to close the case if you want to.

Regards,
Andreas

I hope this message finds you well. Our R&D team got back to us reporting that they fixed this issue on the following test build:

This can be tested by installing any older EPP version(such as the 6.2.3.1xxx from 5.9.4.0) and upgrade it to the test build that we have provided.

Please test this on 2-3 devices and let me know if it works accordingly.

Looking forward to your response.
